attributes.action: Reinstate the death penalty for murderers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the incident of them horrible thugs kicking to death the kind, caring and innocent father of three, I want the death penalty to be brought back.  People like them thugs have no fear of the law, are costing us money in jail and just continue to kill for no reason.  We need to teach them and others real lessons, and not just put them in a cosy cell with three meals a day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
